timeline.bodyText:
Assertions are used in all tests. So the order of test execution should be as follows:

testAssertTrue
testAssertions (the assertions other than assertTrue)
rest of the tests

Therefore, this and the rest of the tests should depend on testAssertions
timeline.author: azinneera

replies.bodyText:
+1
@Ibaqu
Also,
annotations test cases use "before", "dependsOn" annotations. Likewise, shall we order the test execution accordingly?
replies.author: Dilhasha
